sentences.sContent: He’ll be here tomorrow from about seven o’clock onwards.
sentences.sCn: 明天大约7点钟以后他会在这里。

sentences.sContent: We’re going to tell her on her birthday – that’s two weeks from today.
sentences.sCn: 我们打算在她生日那天告诉她——离今天还有两个星期。

sentences.sContent: From now on, I will only be working in the mornings.
sentences.sCn: 从现在起，我只在上午上班。

sentences.sContent: housewives who work from morning to night
sentences.sCn: 从早忙到晚的家庭主妇
